name: search_neonpanel_project_url
description: Search for NeonPanel projects by name, reference number, or project key. Returns project details including the project URL. Project key format: {project_type}-{project_id} (e.g., 'PO-12345', 'FBA-67890').

project_name.description: Project name to search for (partial match supported)

ref_number.description: Project reference number to search for (exact match)
